message.body: Hey babe
Hey! Your message in my yearbook made me so happy :)
<3 well you make me happy
Awww :3 how was st marks
Very fun :-D we ate chipotle and chilled like cool kids. You shoulda came
How was le bagel?
I guessss but I wanted to go home. We didn't stay much longer after you left
Yeaa but were chilling during regents week. Its not a negotiation its happening. And i see ur listening to regina spektor
Yeah obvi I want it to happen right now. Omg yes I love Regina spektor and her new album is amazingggg
I only know one of her songs but i see you and jordan love her lol
Hahah yes we have bonded over this fact
You guys are so adorable next to eachother bc hes so small and youre so big :-D i could watch you for hours
Lmfao that's not creepy at all. Yeah our size difference is endearing, never really an issue
Lmfaoo its not creepy =) so anyways catch me up on ur life
THAT'S MAD WORK. So much has happened but also nothing has happened. We need a lunch date where we can talk about things in person
Okayy when?
Next week, first week of summerrrrrr
Fuck yesss. We can chill sober so we really catch up and then the next time well smoke or something :-D gahh i miss youu
Yeah that sounds perfect! We need to recognize the fact that we live so close to each other and it's so easy for us to hang out. I miss you tooooooo
I know lol. Im going to txt you everytime im doing nothing. Its going to be amazing
Yeahhh I'm so excited! Summer will be amazing
And so hot. Are you working at all?
Nah I don't have a job as of yet. I probably won't get one, I don't really want one. I don't have any plans for summer yet either. I'm completely free!
Lucky lol im working 5 days a week but only from 1 to 6 so its not bad
Ooooh nice, where?
Idk lol its some arts camp in the villiage. The company i worked for last summer closed so they partnered up with a new place which gave me a job.moolah baby
Nice~ you have to be a counselor with kids and shit?
Yupp and as of last week im officially cpr and first aid certified. So i can save ur life if need be
NICE. OMG I'm in good hands
Lol i can teach you mouth to mouth ;-)
Hahaha oooooh feisty
You know me, sluttin it up baby
